document.full_text: chris young reinjured his surgically repaired shoulder and may miss the rest of the season, and the pitching prospect jenrry mejia will have reconstructive elbow surgery.
document.title: rockies 2, mets 1: mets get bad news on young and mejia
lines_and_colors: chris young reinjured his surgically repaired shoulder and may miss the rest of the season, and the pitching prospect jenrry mejia will have reconstructive elbow surgery.
